entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of wet flurries after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 13.
